description.first: Web developer and automation specialist based in Colombia.
description.second: Expert in building interfaces with React/Next.js and complex integrations with WhatsApp API and n8n.

description.first: I am a Full Stack Developer passionate about process optimization. I distinguish myself by bridging traditional software development with modern automation tools to create robust digital ecosystems.
description.second: My technical foundation was formed at Henry bootcamp and continues to expand with my current Software Analysis and Development Technologist degree at SENA (2022-Present), plus specialized courses at Platzi.
description.third: Beyond code, I bring a strategic vision to problem-solving, integrating services like WhatsApp API and n8n workflows to maximize productivity.

portfolio.title: Magneto Web App
